title: Moth Fundraising Hour Fall 2014
teaser: Fundraising hour for stations carrying The Moth Radio Hour weekly. Includes stories from Tig Notaro, Samuel James, and Andrew Solomon, as well as pitch notes that you can adapt for your station.
description: Tig Notaro must find new ground with her step-father after her mother’s sudden death.Samuel James navigates his way through the foster care system as a child.Andrew Solomon discovers an artistic community thriving in post-Taliban Afghanistan.Ideas for scripting are included below to segue between stories, adapt for your station's approach. NPR news compatible.
contentencoded:
Tig Notaro must find new ground with her step-father after her mother’s sudden death.
Samuel James navigates his way through the foster care system as a child.
Andrew Solomon discovers an artistic community thriving in post-Taliban Afghanistan.

Ideas for scripting are included below to segue between stories, adapt for your station's approach. NPR news compatible.
